overview: Sinikka has by chance made acquaintance with her downstairs neighbour Vilja and asked her for help. Clutter has taken over Sinikka’s home and there is only a small human-sized pathway left in the apartment. As a window renovation is approaching, Sinikka needs to clear 1,5 meters empty space. A short documentary of friendship and its meaning in giving and receiving help.
title: 1,5 Meters Space
